examples: their guns were at the ready

definitions.text: prepare for eating by applying heat
examples: can you make me an omelette?
fix breakfast for the guests, please

definitions.text: make ready or suitable or equip in advance for a particular purpose or for some use, event, etc
examples: Get the children ready for school!
I was fixing to leave town after I paid the hotel bill

definitions.text: completely prepared or in condition for immediate action or use or progress
examples: the bridge is ready to collapse
the soup will be ready in a minute
he seems to have ample ready money
he was ready to believe her

definitions.text: made suitable and available for immediate use
apprehending and responding with speed and sensitivity
